SEARCH
Package pl.polsl.lab1.krzysztof.gach.controller

Interface GameInstance

All Known Implementing Classes:
Game
public interface GameInstance
The GameInstance interface defines the contract for game instances, specifying the essential operations required to manage a game.
Version:
1.1
Author:
Krzysztof Gach

    • getIsFullScreen

      boolean getIsFullScreen()
      Returns whether the game is in fullscreen mode.
      Returns:
      true if fullscreen is enabled, false otherwise

    • setIsFullScreen

      void setIsFullScreen(boolean isFullScreen)
      Sets the fullscreen mode for the game.
      Parameters:
      isFullScreen - true to enable fullscreen mode, false otherwise

    • setGameState

      Sets the current game state.
